lead_paragraph: The Federal Bureau of Investigation said Thursday that it was investigating a security breach on AT&T's Web site that allowed a security group to obtain the e-mail addresses of 114,000 iPad 3G owners. The group also obtained the identification numbers known as ICC-IDs that those iPads use to communicate over AT&T's network.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation says it is investigating breach on AT&T's Web site that allowed private security group to obtain e-mail addresses of 114,000 iPad 3G owners (S)
